SubProcess.SubprocessName: Mandatory Additional Reportable Information as per WCI.362(g)(1)-(20)
A verification statement is required if E greater than or equal to 25,000 t CO2e or E has been larger than 25,000 t CO2e in the past 3 reporting periods
